name: Clever Fox Moxie
description:
CLEVER FOX MOXIE is the third game in the LONELY WOLF TREAT series. please play that and FRIENDLY BUNNY MOCHI for the best possible experience! this time, moxie needs to find a way to make money so she can continue to live in the foxy den with her friends... but is she trying too hard?

this game is quite a bit longer than the last two, so estimated playtime is around an hour if you're trying to see everything. by the way, there's a bonus area you can reach if you found the secret code in the previous game... ;)

you can find more of my work HERE and hey if you're into my stuff and want to throw money at me, maybe support me on patreon!

thanks, please enjoy! <3333

~ CREDITS ~

  • art+story+music - NomnomNami
  • special thanks to DarkChibiShadow and PlushMayhem for letting me borrow their OCs!

translations: KyleHeren (korean), npckc (japanese), Nam Hoàng (vietnamese)

GAMES IN THIS SERIES:

  1. LONELY WOLF TREAT
  2. FRIENDLY BUNNY MOCHI
  3. CLEVER FOX MOXIE
  4. WANDERING WOLF TRICK

SPINOFF/FUN STUFF:

  • DATE TREAT (april fools VN)
  • Dress Treat! (flash dressup game)
  • another piece of candy (webcomic)
  • delicacy (18+ comic)

UPDATES:

  • 8/25/2018 - added vietnamese translation
  • 2/1/2017 - added japanese translation
  • 6/22/2016 - added korean translation (updated 8/4/2016)
